column5: Nice Work Simon. Those are some nice Whitefish aand even better Lakers.
Simon how were you fishing the white tube jig? Thanks
awesome simon !!! very nice color on the fat tank lake trout !!! cool,what time is dinner ??? lol..

Thanks....it really is not much 'work' on this lake when the bite is on. In my experience this lake has 2 modes...FEAST....or...FAMINE...for us it was a feast day.    Thanks man...it sure was fun. The smelt in this lake keeps everything...BIG!     Hey JAT,  We were fishing 2 types of tubes, 2" YUM Vibraking tubes in white silver flake with a Matzuo scicle jig heads in white and  Yum 4" white silver flakeon  Matzuo Sickle Rattle Tube Jig  The whitefish would hit the 4" tube but it was hard to hook them on that size but got the bigger trout....whereas the 2" tube got all the whities and the smaller trout.  The whitefish would not take anything on the bottom today. They would only hit when having the bait(2" tube) dead still at about 6' - 10' feet off bottom. Every now and then the bite would die down so i would send the big four inch tube down and pound the bottom. That would bring the fish back to the area and we would just hover our baits at 6' - 10 ' feet and the whities would attack hard and fast rising almost vertically at speed to suck in the bait.   Hope this makes sense and helps.
Thanks for the info

Hi all,  Went out for Whitefish and lakers today with my buddy Carmon. Drilled holes in 34'FOW...did not have to move off that spot...got some tank whitefish and 2 decent lakers. Action was non-stop for whities and we missed a good 2 or 3 more lakers.  Definitely needed a good session....brought the pink gloves with me....they worked their magic!  Variety of lures used...most successful were white tube jigs...crappie size and 4".    THANKS GBW!     SOME VIDEO OF TODAY  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/ZKgd2p5nx-0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>   I GOT 2 DECENT TROUT         WE GOT A STACK OF WHITEFISH TOO...GREAT FUN...GREAT MORNING.         THIS IS WHAT THEY SNACK ON TO GET SO BIG...THIUS WAS THE CONTENTS OF JUST ONE WHITIE
Well done, Simon.  It's amazing how much a fish will gorge itself when on the feed.
Awesome job Simon    you got some great looking lunkers on that trip     Glad to see that you got the monkey off your back
Pink gloves working there magic. I still have mine in my hut, gonna wear them on my next outing.
Dang !!!! Do they sell those gloves at BPS ?
Congratulation, very nice fish. To me, this fish looks like a Splake. Very nice fish!  What do you think are the fish the whitefish had eaten, smelt?
You got your mojo back...baby!!!
Excellent day om the ice, Simon...good looking lakers ...
Where can I get some pink gloves? - oh yah a ladies clothing store.
right on Simon - a nice days work
Sweet Simon!  Now I need some pink gloves for mojo
Yup, smelt. I'd say with confidence that that is a laker.  Great work Simon, those whities are brutes. Man, I wish I could find them close to home... I have some work to do.
defintely some hawgs man, do you smoke the whities?

Yup...seems the pink gloves erased the 'white stripes'    You need to get them on Blair...they really work!    I think they are right next to the ladies swimsuits.    They are smelt....but its not a splake...there are no splake in there.    Thanks Frankie...its about time!    Thanks Gino...it was a blast, nice to have my buddy there too...good fun.   Your in Sudbury and fish Nippissing...ask Blair ......he'll sort you out!   Thanks man!    You would be shunned and banished by all the other steelheaders Mike!    Thanks RC. I used to go all the way to the Manitoba border for whities...like you say...i'm glad this is close by!
Awwwwww yeeeeaahhhhhh!!!!!   Well done sir!  Gorgeous fish....no glove, no love!   :lol:

Amazing day of fishing Simon, good for you, your back on track.  Going to have to come back south to fish with you for a day. No whities caught here yet.  My son and I enjoyed the video, thanks again,  Strangely no one really fishes for whities up here in the winter,   hard to find where they are.  Alot of whities are caught casting in late summer into fall, alot different from back east.  Thanks again for posting the video, we will look for a seat sale.  Cheers and the next time u go out catch one for us.
You are in God's country for sure and those are awesome fish... WTG!!... question is?... so you have a matching pair of fuzzy pink slippers for the gloves?
Dont be ridiculous  I only wear blue fuzzy cookie monster slippers  :rofl2:
Very nice , well done guys
:lol:  Awesome day Simon, congrats! Been far too long since I had a day on the ice like that. Need to check flight times but will be there asap.
Looks like you all had a great day.
LOL...JB.    Thanks man....anytime your down...no worries!    Thanks  was a 'reel' blast    Bring a skidoo with ya, mines broke....lol....or its a long walk out!
Dang... I should have been there yesterday and not today!!  We did get 2 trout but few wf.  Ran around a bit but that didn't pay off either.  What a difference a day makes!  Great fishing Simon!!!
Sweet, some gorgeous lakers there.  Well done

Funny old lake that one eh?...seems to be feast or famine. I'll be there for another kick of the can next week sometime.    The second one was probably the most aggressive strike i have ever seen....raced 20' off the bottom almost vertically in like 2 seconds....BLAM! really freekin anihilated the bait.... cool
